solution:
```python
n, q, a, b = map(int, input().split())
queries = list(map(int, input().split()))

a_pos = a
b_pos = b
total_time = 0

for query in queries:
    move_a_time = abs(a_pos - query)
    move_b_time = abs(b_pos - query)
    
    if move_a_time <= move_b_time:
        total_time += move_a_time
        a_pos = query
    else:
        total_time += move_b_time
        b_pos = query

print(total_time)
```
